body.p: To his Excelency Beriah Magoffin Govener of the Commonwealth of Kentucky your petitioner Respectfully say to you that that daniel A Kriman was convicted to the penitentiary at the term of the Perry circuit upon the ^charge^ of Braking upon the store hous of John Gambrell and taking there from some money we say to your Excelency that the testimony was Entirely circumstantial we to say to you that we would be glad if you could give said Akiman A pardon
